Bajamos datos de la sigte [url](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-08-18/plants.csv)
```{r}

url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-08-18/plants.csv"
planta <- read.csv(url)
```
```{r}
Plantas_ext_ch <- planta|>
filter(country=='Chile')
print(Plantas_ext_ch)

```
```{r}
Plantas_ext_southamerica <- planta|>
  filter(continent=='South America')
print(Plantas_ext_southamerica)
```
